评论概述: This is not a good tank if you get sweaty.
评论详情: I like it, but I probably won't wear it much to the gym just because I sweat a lot and it's not dry fit material.

评论概述: Decent tank top for working out
评论详情: I would like it a bit longer,  but it will do .

类型: Size: MediumColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: It was great to find a cotton work out tank!! So much more comfortable for exercising, and less sweaty. I use mine for a cardio class. I had a little trouble finding the right size. I am 140 lbs and 5’2” and usually wear a medium in tops. The mediums I got were a tad small, so ordered Large. The large was fine in one of the tops, but too big in another. Sizes don’t seem to be consistent. I did keep one, and returned a couple when I found one that fit right. I love the black marbled one. It’s very pretty. Except for the sizing issues, I love these tops.

I was heartened by another review that spoke of the XXS fitting well, so I ordered them, but my experience was not the same. I got 5 tanks. For reference, I am 5'0", 90lbs. They were so incredibly large on me, I thought for sure I was sent the wrong size, but they were all labelled XXS. Now of course I would expect them to be long on me as I am short, but the problem was actually that they were just overall very big.  I have some similar tanks from old navy in petite XS that are my favorite and these XXS's are much, much larger than those, and ON's are already a bit big. These XXS's fit more like a small in any other active brand I've tried, so I'd say probably 2 sizes too big. I don't know if the mis-sizing scales linearly with sizes (i.e., whether or not the other sizes also run so egregiously large), but if you are usually an XXS in, say, beyond yoga or athleta, these will probably not fit.  I'll also add that according to their size chart, they should have fit me as I have pretty much the exact measurements for waist and hips that they list for XXS (actually mine are 0.5" larger). Extremely frustrating that there is such a discrepancy.  All that said, the material is soft and the colors are nice.
Thin and cheaply made. Not very soft. The hems have completely twisted after the second wash. Amazon won’t replace or refund so it was a complete waste of money.
Disappointed that fabric wasn’t a cool cotton T-shirt fabric. Felt like polyester. Shape and loose comfortable fit.
Poor flimsy quality. Wouldn’t recommend.
I love the way this shirt is lightweight for my hot yoga classes.
bad fit and quality at this price. sent it back.
It’s so good that I bought a few more in different colors!
My 16 yr old daughter has stolen it from me.  I wear it as a pajama top but I love it so much I might get another for everyday wear.

I am not sure why reviews say to size down. I ordered my normal size and it was too small. I am an XL in Athleta and that’s larger on me and can wear size 12 in Lululemon tanks and these tanks ran small. Returning.
Cotton, cotton, cotton - finally!!  Just right! Not too big, not too small, not too tight, not too long or short.  Lightweight, breathable, great running comfort for the hot FL weather.  Worth the $$
I'm returning this white one I bought in Medium - it runs large and is very thin....

评论概述: Comfiest and most flattering workout top
评论详情: Super flattering and great material - dupe for the lulu love tank top
Great top. Not too long, not too short and no baggy armholes. I am 5'5, 132lb and 37C bust, Ordered size L. Purchased pink and sparkle blue. Very soft and pretty.

Loved the color but that’s where it ended. As soon as I pulled it out of the package I knew the material was too thin. I tried it on and it was very see through to the point I could see my undergarments and the top line of my pants. Definitely returning and I’m still on the hunt.
Medium was a small with dragging armpits.  Hate to write poor reviews but hope this helps others.
Fits well and looks flattering on

类型: Size: X-SmallColor: Tie Dye Smoke Ink
评论详情: This tank top is a perfect fit! It is not too fitted and the material is soft and comfortable. I highly recommend this brand especially this tank anx their leggings!

Nice shirt. Fits well. A little stretchy but good. However, in my own opinion, not worth the price. I guess I have high expectations but when you pay 20 plus dollars for a tank top!? Its my fault but won't ever be again

Great color- very hard to find pretty greens. Great fitting- slightly loose and not too long. Also ordered the blue one. Have not dried in dryer to avoid shrinking. Wrinkles some after air drying but not a big deal.  Will order more.

评论概述: Cotton, and the cut is not flattering
评论详情: This is not part of the butterluxe collection, which I thought it was. Its a basic cotton shirt that already feels stretched out. The cut is not flattering at all.
The size small was too tight and too sheer for me (5’4””, 140lbs, small breasted). Returned it.

Clearly nothing is sweat proof in July- but when I am buying a workout shirt, I’m looking for fabrics that don’t show such a color difference when they get wet. 🥴 Otherwise, it’s lightweight and flattering.
This shirt fits great. It’s not skin tight but is slightly loose. The material is really soft. I got this in a few different colors and none are see-through. I had to size down 1 size.
Quality, but fit was large and strange. Immediately returned.

Love these tanks. They fit well and look good. Great selection of colors. Size is true to size. They kinda hide the waist but fit well at the chest. If you have a large chest you might want to go up a size.

评论概述: Perfect for exercise in hot, humid weather
评论详情: I have three of these tops for exercise. They breath well and are very comfortable.

I'm delighted to finally find a cotton blend, racer-back tank top that actually fits! It's comfy, has the perfect amount of coverage in front, and I wore it today rock climbing. White is great since chalk doesn't show :-) and the fabric is not super thin or see through. Bought the XXS and it fits well. (I'm 5'3, 116, muscular, small-chested.) Haven't washed it yet, but it looks promising. Also bought 2 other colors. 5 stars so far. If laundering causes problems I'll edit the review. So far, so good!

I tend to avoid cotton, but I love this top. Flattering fit, lovely color (the lavender/grey color), thin but not transparent fabric. Great price. It runs pretty true to size, maybe a tiny bit on the large side. It dries surprisingly fast for cotton and isn’t too hot.
I found this to be a very nice Lululemon dupe! I ordered the xxs and it fits great! Not too loose and not to tight! I will be ordering more colors.
I have a black lululemon tank top just like this one and it is the same quality, fit, and sizing. I will be buying more colors of these!
I love these tops. I ordered multiple colors . Size small I'm 5ft 4 36DD ans 149lb.. they do shrink a tad when you wash them. Encourage to buy a size up for that reason. Very light weight.

评论概述: Perfect top for summer. not form fitting and not so loose were you look bigger.
评论详情: material good quality, nice and soft.
No style in the design or fit. Lays weird on body
Light weight and soft and breezy!!! Loving this brand .. got small and fits loose but not to baggie .. wore it to spin class and was great !
I’m trying to only buy natural fabrics and these Pima cotton tanks are perfect to sleep in and to wear in the summer. Buying several in different colors!
It’s too big
Very nice material but too long to wear with tennis skirts. Would be ok with leggings though

评论概述: Very see through in light grey
评论详情: The light grey color is very see through. It makes it difficult to style and pair with sports bras. These are meant to be a Lululemon dupe, but I don’t think it’s a winner.
Great shirt. Soft. But after first washing and drying (lowest heat setting) it shrank.
CRZ has changed the cut of the racetrack and made it larger. Not a fan.
This workout too was not quality material and it looked like it had been worn. I also prefer to buy products made in the US . The size small was very big. I am returning

I am a fan of the lululemon “love tank” and decided to try this. It fits similarly, love that it has different color choices, and is a much better price point. It has held up nicely in the wash. I am a medium and it fits true to size. I got the color Jade grey and it pairs well with black or neutral leggings for work outs. It does show sweat during really heavy workouts (I do hard-core spin classes) , but so does the love tank. It has a nice shape…not too tight or cropped. Definitely recommend!
The fabric was nice, but somewhat flimsy.  Runs very large.
The fit is perfect. The material is a little thin, but I still like it. I bought the navy so it's not see-through.
I love this top so much I have several. It's very lightweight with a flattering fit. Perfect for pickleball in the Florida heat. The pink is my favorite color.

I was in search of a casual tank that would look good on my body (I have a bit of a tummy and wear a size 12 pants) and wanted the tank to not be skin tight but also not balloon outward. I purchased a size large and my goodness it looks so good. It hangs draws inward a bit at the waist and is super flattering. The material is thin but ideal for warm weather. I plan to purchase more so I can have them as a summer staple.
Love the color! Very soft material.  It is  a looser style which I like and is great length for workout not too long or short

For $24 I was expecting a shirt that I could wear outside.  I picked the white tank and it's so thin that it's completely see through.  I would not feel comfortable wearing this to the gym.  Amazon recommended an XL but it barely fits.  I wanted to use this for Spring/Summer gym workouts but because it is so see through/thin and barely fits I'm going to use it for sleeping.  For the price ... not worth it.
Breath ability is great, but they run small

Love love love CRZ tanks. Fit like a charm. Appearance is 100! I wear them to the gym and working outside in the weekend- very versatile. Super great re breathability. Never had a problem with quality. Other tanks get little mystery holes at the bottom- never happened with these! I stick w black and gray for color! These should be in subscribe and save!
My wife loves it

I've ordered several of these after buying one and wearing it. The fit is consistent and the cut is flattering. The armholes don't gape.  I saw in a  review that someone said this isn't pima cotton. Sure feels like it is to me and I've sewn and worked with lots of fabrics in my time. The 8 percent elastane insures it doesn't consistent shape. I'm using these for hiking and working out. They are great shirts.  Yes, they can be slightly wrinkled after washing and hanging dry. But I'd rather wear cotton than some weird plastic fabric. I'd buy these any time over lululemon. There's a great color selection from pastels to brights. The green jade is particularly gorgeous.

This was cute and soft and draped well right out of the bag. However, it shrank unevenly after washing it so the hem is no longer symmetrical. It faded more than I would’ve expected too. Not worth the price in my opinion.
For nearly $30 this 100% cotton shirt was thin and weak for work outs. No way I’d pay $30 for this to just last a few washes for me.

评论概述: Love color and fabric, but ran big
评论详情: I really love the color of this tank, I got the green one and it matches a pair of leggings I have really nicely. It's also a nice soft material. Downside is that I found it a bit big and didn't really pick up on it until I was already working out in it. I'm going to try to take it in. I generally order a Large in most things but I could have done a Medium for this tank. I'm 5'8" and about 165 for reference with a 38B bust.
great quality, fit - super comfy
Material was thinner than I was expecting, and it puckered out weird in the armpit area. Returning.
Soft material and not too long, exactly what I wanted.
Use to work out, comfy relaxed fit
It’s ok. I like the color and fit although I feel it is too tight. Amazon suggested this size but it’s thin and shows all my flaws.

In love with the CRZ YOGA Women's Pima Cotton Racerback! The fabric is incredibly soft, and the racerback design adds a stylish touch to my workout wardrobe. It's perfect for both yoga sessions and casual wear. Comfortable, breathable, and the fit is just right. A new favorite in my activewear collection!

There are almost no workout shirts available in cotton. This shirt is not only 92% organic cotton, but it also has an awesome drape and looks so cute. The shirt is fairly thin in order to drape so well. I get large size shirts; I have a little pot belly and D size breasts. This shirt in medium highlights my boobs while staying loose on my belly. Highly recommend!
I wear these to play tennis.  They are fitted enough but not skin-tight. Love it-- I have four in different colors.
I loooove their yoga pants but have not had luck with tops. This one was far too big and loose. I tried to love it so kept it past the return window but should have just returned it.

Other reviewers mention how thin these tops are and how easily they wrinkle. They are thin, but not so much that you can see through them. I haven’t had a problem with wrinkling. They are cotton so will not be like polyester, and will definitely be cooler in the hotter weather here in Florida. The thing that I like best is the length. I am short waisted and most tops are either way too short or way too long. These are perfect for me. I just ordered my 7th color, that’s how much I like them!

评论概述: Love these for work outs. Light and comfortable.

Material is has a great feel to it. Not itchy or clingy. I’m 5’ 5” weight 150 and purchased a medium. Fits great
I love the tank! It is a great color and perfect for tennis.

I ordered 3 different colors. Love the fit. But one I had to send back as I got holes in the front after wearing it for less than a day .

This isn't my favorite top I've purchased but it's not the worst either. First the pros: I love the color. I love the material (its really soft). It held up well after washing. It was comfortable to exercise in. The cons: it looks a little “frumpy” on. It's pretty wrinkly out of the dryer and especially if I hang it dry. while the material is very soft, it’s a little thinner than I expected.  If you're looking for comfort its a great buy.
